videos.title: Silver Coin: Age of Monster Hunters - SOLO Playthrough
videos.description: Silver Coin: Age of Monster Hunters is an adventure role playing game combined with Euro game mechanics playable in SOLO, CO-OP or COMPETITIVE MODE, where players will be traveling the world of Atosia to slay the monsters that are troubling the local populace.

videos.title: Silver Coin: Age of Monster Hunters Kickstarter Trailer
videos.description: Become a monster hunter in a solo, co-op or competitive open world adventure game & slay the monsters for a bag of silver coins! Silver Coin: Age of Monster Hunters is an adventure role playing game combined with Euro game mechanics for 1-5 players. Players will be traveling the world of Atosia to slay the monsters that are troubling the local populace. By doing so they will earn coins and the player with the most coins at the end of the game will be declared the winner.

videos.title: How to play - Silver Coin: Age Of Monster Hunters
